function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases in the built environment due to close proximity and association among stakeholders.","Impact":"Increase in the spread of contagious diseases such as COVID-19 within construction sites and built environments.","Mitigation":"Enforce strict social distancing measures and regular sanitation practices within construction sites and built environments. Implement regular health screenings for stakeholders and adopt remote work where possible.","Technologies":"Contactless temperature screening devices, sanitation stations, and remote communication tools for virtual collaboration.","People":"Construction workers, stakeholders, and individuals in built environments.","Owner":"Construction companies, health authorities, and regulatory bodies."}]}
